name: Catch the Apples!
description:
Links

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Turbowarp

                                  Description

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Scratchy is having a Blast! He applied to a apple grabbing competition and is having oh so much fun grabbing those juicy apples!

                                  Features

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-Main Menu

-Changelog (click the "paper" with the log to go back)

-Difficulty System

-Difficulty Transition

-Endless apple collector

-Fixed Running (z)

-High Score System (Thanks to @GarboMuffin for helping with Turbowarp.org)
